title: Hokies return home for Louisville and Notre Dame this weekend - VT hokiesports.com
content: Hokies return home for Louisville and Notre Dame this weekend  VT hokiesports.com
description: Virginia Tech will face a pair of ranked ACC opponents for the second week in a row, this time at home, as the Hokies welcome No. 36 Louisville and No. 21 Notre Dame to the Burrows-Burleson Tennis Center this weekend.
